changelog.zh:
- 新增扫码导入播放列表功能，支持手机扫码快速导入
- 新增扫码搜索功能，支持手机输入搜索内容
- 优化搜索框高度，界面更紧凑
- 修复明亮模式下收藏夹台标不显示的问题
- 将导入和搜索服务合并到同一端口，通过URL路径区分
- 扫码页面HTML分离并支持国际化（中英文自动切换）
changelog.en:
- Added QR code import feature for quick playlist import via mobile
- Added QR code search feature for mobile input
- Optimized search box height for more compact UI
- Fixed channel logo display issue in light mode favorites
- Merged import and search services to same port with URL path distinction
- Separated QR code HTML pages with internationalization support (auto-detect Chinese/English)
